title: Repair tool?
body: Hi, Is there no repair tool in the launcher anymore? I keep getting an issue where my character will jump around on mouse click. It's a graphical issue, but it's very annoying and I don't know how to fix it

replies.body:
Ok. I've done that now, but the issue hasn't fixed itself.

Can anyone else think of a solution to the problem?
I don't really know what you mean by your character "jumping around" on mouse click, but if it's a graphics issue I'd suggest updating, reinstalling, or rolling back your video driver.

Hey there,

The repair tool is still in the launcher, to repair your client perform the following steps

1. Run League of Legends.
2. Click on the "?" icon that is located in the top right corner of the window.
3. Click Repair.
4. Wait. The repair function can take anywhere from 5 minutes to over 30 depending on the number of corrupt files it has to repair.
